datasets.name: e26fe183
queryLines:
SELECT
  c.customername,
  c.province,
  o.orderdate,
  o.orderamt,
  o.salesrep,
  p.productname
FROM
  ca_orders as o
    JOIN ca_customers as c
      ON o.customerid = c.customerid
   JOIN ca_products AS p
  ON o.productid = p.productid
WHERE
  orderdate >= '2022-01-01'
  AND orderdate <= '2022-12-31';

datasets.name: b6fda01a
queryLines:
SELECT 
      sum(orderamt) AS Total_Sales, 390000000 AS Sales_Goal 
  FROM 
      ca_orders
  WHERE 
      orderdate >= '2024-01-01' AND orderdate <= '2024-12-31' ;

datasets.name: 1ea7dfb9
queryLines:
SELECT
  c.customername,
  c.province,
  o.orderdate,
  o.orderamt,
  o.salesrep,
  p.productname
FROM
  ca_orders as o
    JOIN ca_customers as c
      ON o.customerid = c.customerid
   JOIN ca_products AS p
  ON o.productid = p.productid

datasets.name: 6f105919
queryLines:
WITH original_table AS (
    SELECT 
  DATE_TRUNC("WEEK", `orderdate`) AS orderdate,
  SUM(`orderamt`) AS orderamt
FROM (
    SELECT
  c.customername,
  c.province,
  o.orderdate,
  o.orderamt,
  o.salesrep,
  p.productname
FROM
  ca_orders as o
    JOIN ca_customers as c
      ON o.customerid = c.customerid
   JOIN ca_products AS p
  ON o.productid = p.productid
) GROUP BY 1
  ),
  dates AS (
    SELECT 
      MAX(orderdate) AS max_date_column,
      MIN(orderdate) AS min_date_column,
      MAX_BY(orderamt, orderdate) AS orderamt
    FROM original_table
  ),
  forecast_table AS (
    SELECT 
      orderdate,
      orderamt_forecast,
      orderamt_upper,
      orderamt_lower,
      NULL AS orderamt
    FROM AI_FORECAST(
      TABLE(original_table),
      horizon => (
        SELECT
          max_date_column + MAKE_DT_INTERVAL(CAST(FLOOR(DATEDIFF(max_date_column, min_date_column) * 0.5) AS INT), 0, 0, 0)
        FROM dates
      ),
      time_col => 'orderdate',
      value_col => 'orderamt'
    )
  )

  SELECT * FROM forecast_table
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    orderdate,
    NULL AS orderamt_forecast,
    NULL AS orderamt_upper,
    NULL AS orderamt_lower,
    orderamt
  FROM original_table
    WHERE orderdate < (SELECT max_date_column FROM dates)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    max_date_column AS orderdate,
    orderamt AS orderamt_forecast,
    orderamt AS orderamt_upper,
    orderamt AS orderamt_lower,
    orderamt
  FROM
    dates

queryLines:
WITH original_table AS (

This dashboard helps you support and evaluate our Canada sales
